earthbending.label: VR Handtracking Earthbending
description: This is a prototype game featuring a Handtracking input system for the Oculus Quest using Unity. It is based off of earthbending from Avatar: The Last Airbender. I allowed activation of different telekinetic actions by detecting different combinations of the user moving one or two hands in different directions, speeds, and gestures. The end result is a unique interaction in virtual reality and it captures the feeling of how I think earthbending should feel.

sevenwonders.label: 7 Wonders AR Calculator
description: 7 Wonder is a board game where players must calculate their points based on the combination of cards they have collected. The calculation can be tricky to do with a lot of cards, so I thought it would be fun to make an image recognition calculator to make it easier.

Augmented Reality in this case is primarily used as an intuitive feedback visual to show that a card has successfully been scanned and recognized. The project was built as an iOS application using ARKit and SwiftUI.

terraforming-mars.label: Terraforming Mars 3D Assistant
description: Terraforming Mars is a strategy board game where the players are required to frequently keep track of resource and production levels on a player mat using different types of cubes. This project is an online version of the player mat, just for fun.
This project utilizes the DOM as the enviroment for physics colliders in a 3D scene using React, Three.js and Cannon.js.
